item.title: Hey Amigo! A Toast to Your Death
item.description: Hey Amigo! A Toast to Your Death is a 1970 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Paolo Bianchini and starring Wayde Preston.

item.title: Duck, You Sucker!
item.description: Duck, You Sucker!, also known as A Fistful of Dynamite and Once Upon a Time in… the Revolution, is a 1971 Italian epic Zapata Western film directed and co-written by Sergio Leone and starring Rod Steiger, James Coburn and Romolo Valli.

item.title: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe
item.description: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe (Italian: Un genio, due compari, un pollo is a 1975 spaghetti western comedy film directed by Damiano Damiani and Sergio Leone, who directed the opening scene.

item.title: Mannaja
item.description: Mannaja is an Italian 1977 Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Martino. The main role, Blade, is played by Maurizio Merli. Other central roles are played by John Steiner, Sonja Jeannine, Donald O'Brien, Philippe Leroy and Martine Brochard.

item.title: The Longest Hunt
item.description: Spara, Gringo, spara is a 1968 Italian spaghetti western directed by Bruno Corbucci.

item.title: Long Days of Hate
item.description: Long Days of Hate is a 1968 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Gianfranco Baldanello.
